metadata.description: GitHub Official MCP Server - Repository management and code search
security_notes: Requires GitHub PAT with repo scope
Token should have minimal necessary permissions
Risk: Tool poisoning via malicious repository content
Risk: Cross-tool exfiltration if combined with other MCPs
Mitigation: Use scoped tokens, enable audit logging
WARNING: Using :latest tag - consider pinning to specific version or SHA256 digest
WARNING: Supply chain risk - verify image provenance before first use
requirements: Network access to Docker Hub and GitHub API

metadata.description: Mermaid MCP Server - Diagram generation from text descriptions
security_notes: Low risk: Generates diagrams from text input
Risk: Prompt injection via tool descriptions
Mitigation: Validate generated output, sandbox execution
WARNING: Supply chain risk - npx downloads and executes packages without verification
RECOMMENDATION: Install locally and pin version instead of using npx -y

notes: MCP invocations are not currently captured in ATOM trail
This represents a visibility gap in the audit system
best_practices: Use environment variables for all secrets (never hardcode)
Apply principle of least privilege to API tokens
Monitor for unusual MCP invocation patterns
